com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.search

Interface FindSimilarService<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The desired type of the documents returned by the service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FindSimilarServiceImpl

    public interface FindSimilarService<T extends Serializable>
    Service representing the FindSimilarDocuments API

    • Method Summary

      Finds similar documents to the text from a url using the given token proxy

    • Method Detail

      • findSimilarDocumentsToText

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToText(String text,
                                           QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                    throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the given text using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToText

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToText(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                           String text,
                                           QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                    throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the given text using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        text - The query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToReference

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToReference(String reference,
                                                QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from an object store object using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        reference - An HP Haven OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToReference

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToReference(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                                String reference,
                                                QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                         throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from an object store object using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        reference - An HP Haven OnDemand reference obtained from either the Expand Container or Store Object API. The contents of the object will be used as the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToUrl

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToUrl(String url,
                                          QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                   throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from a url using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToUrl

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToUrl(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                          String url,
                                          QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                   throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from a url using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        url - A publicly accessible HTTP URL from which the query text can be retrieved
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToIndexReference

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToIndexReference(String indexReference,
                                                     QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from a document in HP Haven OnDemand using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        indexReference - The reference of a document in HP Haven OnDemand
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToIndexReference

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToIndexReference(TokenProxy<?,TokenType.Simple> tokenProxy,
                                                     String indexReference,
                                                     QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text from a url using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        indexReference - The reference of a document in HP Haven OnDemand
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • findSimilarDocumentsToFile

        QueryResults<T> findSimilarDocumentsToFile(File file,
                                           QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                    throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text in a file using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        file - A file containing the query text
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of documents that are similar to the query text
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

                                           QueryRequestBuilder params)
                                    throws HodErrorException
        Finds similar documents to the text in a file using a token provided by a TokenProxyService
